snippet: In the middle of Andrew Friedman's introduction as the Los Angeles Dodgers' president of baseball operations, a question was asked from a corner of the room....

headline.print_headline: Friedman: Dodgers to Hire GM, Keep Mattingly
headline.main: Friedman: Dodgers to Hire GM, Keep Mattingly

lead_paragraph: In the middle of Andrew Friedman's introduction as the Los Angeles Dodgers' president of baseball operations, a question was asked from a corner of the room.
